name: Bouncing ball eXtreme 2
description:
Want to go back in time when we played games to have fun and it was easy to play those arcade games? We developed an old school game called Bouncing ball eXtreme 2.
Bouncing ball eXtreme 2 is a mix between pinball and a pong style arcade where you have to move a paddle to hit a ball and bounce it to bonus areas to make as big score as you can.

How to play:
To move your paddle, touch on the left or the right side of the screen. Try to hit bonus areas as many time as you can to gain bigger score.
If your ball will hit a question mark you will get a random price like extra points, extra ball or extra speed. If you will drop a ball down the visible area you will loose.

If you like Bouncing ball eXtreme 2 give a rate and a review to this game.
